summary_text: A romantic suspense-comedy about CIA agent Harry (Bill Pullman) and SVR agent Natasha (Irene Jacob) fighting to save the world, their lives and secret love in the post cold war Helsinki.

name: Pourquoi pas moi?
summary_text: Four gay French expatriots share a business in Barcelona. When they and their parents are thrown together for a "coming out" party, another French Farce ensues.

name: Heaven
summary_text: Robert's wife is divorcing him for gambling etc. A strip club owner offers him work redesigning his club. Robert befriends a dancer there, who has premonitions.

name: Knight Rider 2010
summary_text: Loosely based on the popular television series of the 80's, this movie brings the story into an apocalyptic time and a new "KITT".

summary_text: The adventures of three teenage friends in 1970s Detroit.

name: Firepower
summary_text: A merc is hired by the F.B.I. to track down a powerful recluse criminal. A woman is also trying to track him down for her own personal vendetta.

name: Rapture
summary_text: Agnes, a lonely teenage girl, and her father befriend an escaped convict, named Joseph, who arrives at their farm in Brittany, France. When Joseph develops an attraction to Agnes, her father threatens to break up the union.

summary_text: Surfers are being brutally murdered. Is the culprit a sea monster or just one of the teens' jealous parents?

summary_text: Over a period of a week the voice of God is heard on radios all over the world.

name: Beach House

name: We Don't Belong Here
summary_text: A matriarch of a dysfunctional family is pushed to her tipping point by the disappearance of her son.

name: Manson, My Name Is Evil
summary_text: Perry, a sheltered chemical engineer, falls in love with Leslie, a former homecoming princess, when he becomes a jury member at her hippie death cult murder trial.

name: Within the Whirlwind
summary_text: During Stalin's reign of terror, Evgenia Ginzburg, a literature professor, was sent to 10 years hard labor in a gulag in Siberia. Having lost everything, and no longer wishing to live, she meets the camp doctor and begins to come back to life.

summary_text: Carman must enter the boxing ring once again. Even though the doctor has advised him against it, he picks up his gloves for one last fight, for his father, for his church, for his love, and for his life.

name: Irezumi
summary_text: A seductive woman gets kidnapped into prostitution. After getting a spider tattoo made on her back, she grows vengeful, leaving several men in her path.

summary_text: Turkish Pollyanna's story.

summary_text: A passionately committed young dancer is forced to re-examine his career and life when faced with death, finding hope through an older man who becomes his lover, mentor and companion.

summary_text: There's a rapist plaguing a neighborhood. Now a young newlywed suspects that her new husband may be the one doing this.

name: The Ox
summary_text: Swedish pauper's family is starving. In desperation, he steals his lord's ox. He hopes that the crime will not be revealed, but it happens.

name: Retribution
summary_text: A Manic depressive artist survives a suicidal fall only to be possessed by a murdered gangster, who uses the artist to seek vengeance on those that ended his life.

name: The Mystery of Oberwald
summary_text: One long decade after the assassination of her husband, a reclusive queen comes face-to-face with the deceased's doppelgänger and anarchist poet, and strikes a three-day pact; however, fate has other plans. What is the mystery of Oberwald?

name: The Upturned Glass
summary_text: A British brain surgeon punishes the murderess of his lover.

name: Immortal Sergeant
summary_text: During a WW2 patrol in the North-African desert, a Canadian corporal reminisces about his sweetheart and must lead his platoon when the sergeant gets wounded.

name: Rahul Subramanian: Kal Main Udega
summary_text: Rahul Subramanian's stand up comedy solo 'Kal Main Udega' is filled with unrelated topics, no transitions, inconsequential takes on consequential subjects and also a bit of mildly bad dancing.

name: Ribâzu ejji
summary_text: A group of high school students experience the brutal front of urban isolation after a corpse washes up from the river.

name: Perfect
summary_text: Garrett, an emotionally-troubled young man, is sent to a clinic, whispering soothing promises of perfection. By planting characteristics directly into his own body, he's relieved of his dark visions, but pays the price for purity of mind.

name: Paayum Puli
summary_text: A cop mistakenly believes that taking out three thugs will end Madurai's crime wave.

name: Io e lei
summary_text: Marina and Federica have been together for five years now, they share the same apartment, bed, face cream, they laugh, they fight, but even so sometimes they are not sure if they're a couple or not.

name: Auf kurze Distanz
summary_text: An undercover agent (Tom Schilling) suffers from an inner conflict as he is supposed to betray his friend who is part of the Serbian sports betting mafia in Berlin.

name: The Boy in the Dress
summary_text: Dennis, a twelve-year-old boy, enjoys football and fashion. The film shows the reactions of his family and friends to his eclectic activities.

name: Breaking the Bank
summary_text: With ruthless US and Japanese investment banks circling Tuftons, a struggling two-hundred-year-old, family-run British bank, can its bumbling, incompetent chairman, Sir Charles Bunbury, fend off the onslaught and save the bank?

name: Yosemite
summary_text: It's the fall of 1985. The intertwining tales of three 5th grade friends, Chris, Joe and Ted, unfold in the suburban paradise of Palo Alto, as the threat of a mountain lion looms over the community.

name: Move On
summary_text: An unusual road trip beginning in the Netherlands takes a series of unexpected turns through Germany and Eastern Europe.

name: Yelling to the Sky
summary_text: As her family falls apart, seventeen year old Sweetness O'Hara is left to fend for herself in a neighborhood where her survival is uncertain.

name: Dune Drifter
summary_text: After a devastating orbital space battle, the survivor of a crashed star-fighter must navigate the harsh environment of a desolate planet to save herself before her life support expires.

name: Don't Let Them In
summary_text: A home invasion horror movie in the vein of You're Next and The Purge, about a group of people under siege by masked intruders in an abandoned hotel.

name: Anandabhadram
summary_text: Following his mother's death, the protagonist returns from the US to his ancestral home to fulfill his mother's last wish. Upon arrival he understands that the world of black magic and sorcery he heard as stories were not far from real.

name: Fade to Black
summary_text: Attempting to recover from his failed marriage to Rita Hayworth and restart his career, Orson Welles travels to Italy only to be drawn into a dangerous web of intrigue, murder and politics when an actor is murdered on his set.

name: Snowfever
summary_text: A "Costa!" story among snowboarders in an Austrian ski resort.

name: Lalsalu
summary_text: In this tragic-comic study of religious hypocrisy, a disreputable cleric convinces villagers that their community is home to a famous holyman's grave.

name: Camp Slaughter
summary_text: A bunch of kids go to the woods to party. At the same time a freak known as The Bunny Man has escaped from his nest...

summary_text: After being dumped by her boyfriend, a young talented musician (Witt) reluctantly moves back in with her parents and then stumbles into misadventures as she tries to make sense of this crazy life.

name: Dami kanyat
summary_text: A couple of young ladies decide to obtain a driving license. The film is a true comedy of relations, caused between the driving-teacher and the beginner-drivers.

summary_text: The ghost of John Belushi looks back on his troubled life and career, while journalist Bob Woodward researches Belushi's life as he prepares to write a book about the late comic actor.

name: Barnens ö

name: Don't Touch the White Woman!
summary_text: A highly stylized surreal farce about the events leading up to Custer's Last Stand anachronistically reenacted in an urban renewal area in modern Paris.

name: Invasion of the Blood Farmers
summary_text: Somewhere in upstate New York, A secretive group of farmers are harvesting human blood for a mysterious purpose.

name: Heaven with a Gun

name: Strange Bedfellows

name: Return to Peyton Place
summary_text: The residents of Peyton Place are not happy when its most famous resident, Alison Mackenzie, writes a "shocking" novel detailing the sinful secrets of the town.

name: Giants and Toys
summary_text: In the middle of a fierce commercial competition between three caramel companies, an executive builds up a ditsy teenage girl as a mascot while simultaneously trying to uncover the rival companies' plans.

name: Port of New York
summary_text: Two narcotics agents go after a gang of murderous drug dealers who use ships docking at the New York harbor to smuggle in their contraband.

name: The Highway Rat
summary_text: A greedy rat travels the highway in search of other animals' food.

name: Jerrod Carmichael: 8
summary_text: This one-hour show features Carmichael's sharp, subversive take on a range of topics such as Trump's victory, climate change, supporting the troops, animal rights, being a good boyfriend, and more.

name: Cristela Alonzo: Lower Classy
summary_text: She's no stranger to breaking glass ceilings. She's also not opposed to cleaning them.

name: The Scent of Rain & Lightning
summary_text: A young woman investigates the murder of her parents when rumors suggest the man convicted of the crime may not be the killer after all.

name: Tyttö nimeltä Varpu
summary_text: Little Wing tells the story of 12-year-old Varpu (Linnea Skog), who's quickly growing to adulthood, and about her mother (Paula Vesala), who doesn't want to grow up.

summary_text: Multiple love stories unfold in Barcelona during Christmas's Eve.

name: Peruchazhi
summary_text: The film is about how Jagannathan a young politician from India ends up being the chief political adviser to the California state Governor's election campaign and his use of tactics standard of Indian politics to win the election.

name: Kelly + Victor
summary_text: Kelly and Victor meet at a nightclub and start a sexual relationship, the excitement of which removes them from the dull ordinariness of their lives.

name: Don Seenu
summary_text: To make himself known as a gang-leader, a man must woo the sister of a dangerous gangster.

name: Line of Duty
summary_text: Four friends from the rough side of town grow apart when two are consumed by a life of crime, and the other two become FBI agents sent deep undercover - to bring down those childhood friends.

name: Colour from the Dark
summary_text: Ivan Zuccon's adaptation of the classic H.P. Lovecraft story The Colour Out of Space.

name: The Jammed
summary_text: A thriller about trafficking, governmental deportation and the sex slave trade in Melbourne.

name: The Rosa Parks Story
summary_text: A seamstress recalls events leading to her act of peaceful defiance that prompted the 1955 bus boycott in Montgomery, Alabama.

name: Cubbyhouse
summary_text: A mom of 3 buys a cheap, old house. The backyard cubby-house is cursed with pure evil that took the previous owner's 2 kids.

name: Dreaming of Joseph Lees
summary_text: A young woman in rural 1950s England becomes involved in a scandalous love triangle that will inevitably leave someone behind to suffer the consequences.

name: Monster in a Box
summary_text: This is the story of Spalding Gray and his attempt to write a novel. It is a first person account about writing and living, and dealing with success while trying to be successful.

name: Madonna: Blond Ambition World Tour Live
